Token.Abstract: The PWMapViewDelegate protocol defines a set of optional methods that you can use to receive building-related update messages. Since many map operations require the PWMapView class to load data asynchronously, the map view calls these methods to notify your application when specific operations complete. PWMapViewDelegate inherits from MKMapViewDelegate.
Asks the delegate how the MKMapCamera will be set when the building is completely loaded.

Parameter.Name: mapView
Parameter.Abstract: The map view that started the load operation.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The MKMapCamera that will be set when the building is completely loaded.

Token.Abstract: Asks the delegate for the PWFloor that will be displayed as the intial floor.

Parameter.Name: mapView
Parameter.Abstract: The map view that started the load operation.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The PWFloor that will be set as the initial floor.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the specified map view successfully loaded the necessary building data.

Parameter.Name: mapView
Parameter.Abstract: The map view that started the load operation.

Parameter.Name: building
Parameter.Abstract: The building that was loaded.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the specified view was unable to load the building data.

Parameter.Name: mapView
Parameter.Abstract: The map view that started the load operation.

Parameter.Name: building
Parameter.Abstract: The building that the map view tried to load.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: The reason that the map data could not be loaded.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the specified map view successfully changed the building floor.

Parameter.Name: mapView
Parameter.Abstract: The map view that changed the floor.

Parameter.Name: floor
Parameter.Abstract: The current floor displayed in the map view.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the specified map view failed to change the building floor.

Parameter.Name: mapView
Parameter.Abstract: The map view that attempted to change the floor.

Parameter.Name: floor
Parameter.Abstract: The floor that the map view attempted to change to.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: The reason that the floor could not be loaded.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the map view will start tracking the user’s indoor location.

Parameter.Name: mapView
Parameter.Abstract: The map view tracking the user’s location.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the map view stopped tracking the user’s indoor location.

Parameter.Name: mapView
Parameter.Abstract: The map view that stopped tracking the user’s indoor location.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that an attempt to locate the user’s position failed.

Parameter.Name: mapView
Parameter.Abstract: The map view tracking the user’s indoor location.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: An error object containing the reason why location acquisition failed.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the indoor location of the user was updated.

Parameter.Name: mapView
Parameter.Abstract: The map view tracking the user’s location.

Parameter.Name: locationManager
Parameter.Abstract: The location manager providing location updates.

Parameter.Name: userLocation
Parameter.Abstract: The location object representing the user’s latest location. This property may be nil.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the user's location has been snapped to a route.

Parameter.Name: mapView
Parameter.Abstract: The map view snapping locations to a route.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the user's location was unsnapped from a route.

Parameter.Name: mapView
Parameter.Abstract: The map view no longer snapping locations to a route.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the route instruction being highlighted has changed.

Parameter.Name: mapView
Parameter.Abstract: The map view reporting the step change.

Parameter.Name: instruction
Parameter.Abstract: The new instruction being highlighted on the map, or nil if it has been cleared.

Token.Abstract: Asks the delegate whether the automatic route instruction change should be animated.

Parameter.Name: mapView
Parameter.Abstract: The map view asking whether or not to animate automatic route instruction changes.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A Boolean value indicating whether or not to animate automatic route instruction changes.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the map view's user tracking mode was updated.

Parameter.Name: mapView
Parameter.Abstract: The map view with the altered user tracking mode.

Parameter.Name: mode
Parameter.Abstract: The mode used to track the user’s location.

Token.Abstract: Asks the delegate whether the heading calibration display should be shown.

Parameter.Name: mapView
Parameter.Abstract: The map view asking whether or not to display the heading calibration.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A Boolean value indicating whether or not the heading calibration should be displayed.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the user's heading has changed.

Parameter.Name: mapView
Parameter.Abstract: The map view reporting the change in user heading.

Parameter.Name: heading
Parameter.Abstract: The new heading value being reported.

Token.Abstract: Requests the view associated with the specified point-of-interest object.

Parameter.Name: mapView
Parameter.Abstract: The map view containing the annotation view.

Parameter.Name: poi
Parameter.Abstract: The object representing the point-of-interest that is about to be displayed.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that a point-of-interest view was added to the map.

Parameter.Name: mapView
Parameter.Abstract: The map view containing the annotation view.

Parameter.Name: view
Parameter.Abstract: The object representing the annotation that is about to be displayed.

Parameter.Name: poi
Parameter.Abstract: The object representing the point-of-interest that is about to be displayed.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that one or more annotation views were added to the map.

Parameter.Name: mapView
Parameter.Abstract: The map view containing the annotation views.

Parameter.Name: views
Parameter.Abstract: An array of MKAnnotationView objects representing the views that were added.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the user tapped one of the point-of-interest view’s accessory buttons.

Parameter.Name: mapView
Parameter.Abstract: The map view containing the annotation view.

Parameter.Name: view
Parameter.Abstract: The point-of-interest view whose button was tapped.

Parameter.Name: control
Parameter.Abstract: The visual elements that convey a specific action or intention in response to user interactions.

Parameter.Name: poi
Parameter.Abstract: The point-of-interest whose button was tapped.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that one of its annotation views was selected.

Parameter.Name: mapView
Parameter.Abstract: The map view containing the annotation view.

Parameter.Name: view
Parameter.Abstract: The point-of-interest view that was selected.

Parameter.Name: poi
Parameter.Abstract: The point-of-interest that was selected.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that one of its annotation views was deselected.

Parameter.Name: mapView
Parameter.Abstract: The map view that requested the annotation view.

Parameter.Name: view
Parameter.Abstract: The point-of-interest view that was deselected.

Parameter.Name: poi
Parameter.Abstract: The point-of-interest that was deselected.
